title: Police appeal after woman needs hospital treatment for facial injuries after assault in Newport
content:
POLICE are appeal for information after a woman required hospital treatment for facial injuries following an incident in Newport. 
 
The incident occurred on Clarence Place in Newport at around 4am on July 4. 
 
A 25-year-old woman from Newport received facial injuries which required treatment in hospital. 
   
 Share article  
   
Police are now trying to identify a man who was caught on CCTV in relation to the incident 
 
Anyone with information relating to this is asked to call 101 quoting log 148 04/
